column1: Documentation of the configuration database in detail

column4: Description
ID of the timestep, must start with 1 and must be numbered consecutively
UTC time stamp of the beginning of the time step in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
Local time stamp of the beginning of the time step in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
Time zone name of the local time as text (might change e.g. through daylight saving time)
Name of the simulation attribute, see table overview for details on required keys
Value of the simulation attribute
ID of the substation, must start with 1 and must be numbered consecutively
Name of the substation
ID of the control unit, must start with 1 and must be numbered consecutively
ID of the substation to which this control unit is connected to [Foreign key]
Holds the value 1, iff there is a wallbox connected to this control unit
ID of the measurement unit, must start with 1 and must be numbered consecutively
ID of the control unit to which this measruement unit is assigned [Foreign key]
Name of the meter point, i.e. MPRN (Meter Point Reference Number in UK) or MELO (Meter Location Number in Germany)
Holds the value 1, iff this measurement unit shows a demand at least at one point in the simulation time
Holds the value 1, iff this measurement unit shows a feedin at least at one point in the simulation time
Holds the value 1, iff a residential PV installation is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff an open-space PV installation is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a battery is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a heat pump is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
Holds the value 1, iff a CHP is connected (exclusivley and not exclusivley) to the measuremt unit
ID of the location where the measurement unit is located at
The time step for which the dataset is valid [Foreign key]
The normalized feed-in value at the given timestep
The time step for which the dataset is valid [Foreign key]
The normalized feed-in value at the given timestep
